message.raw:
Added check for NI PCIe 6363 to ensure that the current version of NI-DAQmx is not 14.0.

NI-DAQmx v14.0 seems to have a bug where the Digital Output task raises the following exception: "DAQError: Finite acquisition or generation has been stopped before the requested number of samples were acquired or generated."

Other versions of NI-DAQmx don't seem to have this issue, and neither does the NI PCI 6733 even when using DAQmx v14.0.

The issue is resolved using NI DAQmx v14.2 or higher (also tested as working with v9.2.3)
